channel.title: Authors on Reefayat Majumder
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Reefayat Majumder

item.description:
I have 2+ years of freelance experience in conducting a variety of projects, from being a data analyst and researcher for fast-paced, complex data analysis and machine learning projects. I have utilized software packages like Microsoft Excel and Python, to sort, analyze, and visualize large datasets (over 250,000 data points). I have created interactive dashboard environments as well as complex analysis environments using Tableau and generated easy-to-digest reports using Power BI.

A huge component of freelance work is to build a good rapport with clients. After 2+ years of freelance work, I can say that I am confident and comfortable in dealing with clients in a professional manner.
